page.title: 05Industries In The Area
page.content: The area is considered an employment "black spot."Industry is limited to a few factories with low employment figures. The two main factories are "Ready Roasted Chickens" and "Pirelli General."The former makes all kinds of chickens such as curries,pies and pasties.The latter makes a specialised form of cables. There are goverment sponsered schemes within the area.These concentrate on renevating the homes of the elderly or reclaiming over_run canals,churchyards etc.These schemes only run for one year. Two goverment sponsored private buisnesses have started in the locality.One concentrates on computers the other sells microwave ovens. Another new buisness is the video hire buisness.Three have opened lately
